fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player at night. Next day, they wiill not be able to vote. Roles with multiple votes are able to do so, but have one less vote. The amount of votes required for majority is reduced. If you do not use your ability, you will store one charge. Every two charges can be used to prevent an additional player from voting alongside your regular ability. Charges can be used on any night. They can be used at the same time.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If a player rolls Rigger and there is currently no Leader, turn said player into the Leader.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
You didn't use your night ability and stored a charge for later. (No action during the night)
You collected enough charges to rig an extra player. (Two charges collected)
You were exploited by the Rigger. You cannot vote during the next Voting Phase!
